title: Awesome machines compilation   International harvester tractor commercial

tasks.task: Repetitive motion to walk or move forward.
subtasks: Lift one foot and move it forward.
Lower lifted foot and raise the other foot.
Align head, shoulders, torso, and legs in a straight line.
Keep torso upright without leaning excessively.
Adjust stride length and foot placement as needed to maintain balance.
Open mouth and expel air to make "Let's go" sound.
Repeat vocalization multiple times without loss of pitch or volume.

tasks.task: Coordinate verbal commands with physical movement.
subtasks: Time vocalization with each step taken during walking.
Ensure verbal commands coincide with corresponding movements for emphasis.
Alternate between consecutive commands in consistent timing.
Direct gaze forward while walking to maintain direction.
Use peripheral vision to adjust course as necessary.
Step confidently and evenly to stay on a straight path.
Use arms to swing naturally while walking.
Take larger steps when moving forward at a faster pace.

tasks.task: Compete or challenge others to physical exertion.
subtasks: Gauge others' speed and energy levels during walking.
Encourage continued movement by maintaining vocal commands and physical momentum.
